response: Initialized Beads workflow in AGENTS.md and imported plan.md work into Beads issues (MVP epic + Phase 2 epic + child tasks).
Implemented SQLite job queue + runner and exposed /api/jobs + /api/jobs/enqueue.
Added scan-based watcher with stability gate, temp-file ignores, and ingest_file job enqueue; exposed /api/watch and /api/watch/scan.
Implemented canonical ingestion: ingest_file job copies into Unified raw structure with canonical names + .meta.json, plus ingestEnabled gating so watcher only enqueues when enabled.
Added transcript extraction (VTT cleanup + text normalize) in core and server extract_transcript job that caches cleaned text/stats; ingest_file enqueues it for transcript artifacts.
